title: Did C-Span insult Mitch McConnell?
subtitle: A comment shows that the insult of the majority leader of the Senate has never been on despite the claim that a screen shot pretends to show it wasn't "Fotoshop."
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: On the network news channel, the chyron contained a vulgar insult against the majority president of the Senate, Mitch McConnell.
